org.pathvisio.core.model

Class CurvedConnectorShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pathvisio.core.model.AbstractConnector
      • org.pathvisio.core.model.SegmentedConnector
        • org.pathvisio.core.model.ElbowConnectorShape
          • org.pathvisio.core.model.CurvedConnectorShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorShape

    public class CurvedConnectorShape
extends ElbowConnectorShape
    Implements a curved connector that draws curved lines between the segments.

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D fromLineCoordinate(double l)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectorShape
